title: Introducing: Advance Base
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/advancebase.jpg "advancebase")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8452-introducing-advance-base/attachment/advancebase)

So I was walking to work this morning listening to the Classic that is, _Etiquette_, by the now not functioning [**Casiotone For The Painfully Alone**](http://www.cftpa.org/). That record will probably always make me sad, not least because it’s so fucking heart wrenching, but also because I was under the impression that **Owen Ashworth** would never make music again. Rather wonderfully I came home later that day to find this whimsical, spiritually ecstatic tune in my inbox. It’s short, delicate and tells the story of a childhood pony. A new direction, a beautiful song and a perfect end to the day.

[Whirlaway The Horse](http://soundcloud.com/advance-base/whirlaway-the-horse) by [Advance Base](http://soundcloud.com/advance-base)
